contentrichtext.text: {{For|other stations named King's Cross|King's Cross station (disambiguation)}} {{Use dmy dates|date=November 2012}} {{Infobox CityRail station | image = Entrance to Kings Cross station.JPG | station_name = Kings Cross | servicearea = Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line | code = KSX | suburb = Potts Point | street = Victoria Street | distance = 3.41 | altitude = ? | traintype = Suburban all stops<br>Suburban limited stops<br>NSW TrainLink Intercity<br>(peak hour only) | platforms = 2 | tracks = 2 | platform_arr = 1 island | stationtype = Underground | gates = Yes | connect = Bus | disabled = Yes | facilities = [http://www.cityrail.info/stations/station_details?stationId=25 Link] }} '''Kings Cross railway station''' is an underground [[Sydney Trains|railway]] station in [[Sydney, Australia]]. The station is on the [[Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra railway line|Eastern Suburbs line]], one of the [[Sydney underground railways]]. It serves the busy [[Kings Cross, New South Wales|Kings Cross]] area, which is the densest residential area in Australia. Kings Cross is well known as the location of Sydney's [[red-light district]]. The station was opened in 1979 upon the completion of the [[Illawarra railway line, Sydney|eastern suburbs line]]. ==Platforms and services== The station is served by six to eight trains per hour each way, with additional trains during weekday peak hours. {{CityRail platform box | p1linename = Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra line | p1stop = all stations and limited stops services to Hurstville, Mortdale, Sutherland, Cronulla, and Waterfall via Central | p1notes = intercity services to Thirroul and Port Kembla operate during peak hours | p2linename = Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra line | p2stop = all stations services to Bondi Junction | p2notes = intercity services to Bondi Junction from Thirroul and Port Kembla operate during peak hours }} ==Transport links== Outbound bus services: *200 - [[Bondi Junction]] via [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]] *311 - [[Circular Quay]] via [[Elizabeth Bay, New South Wales|Elizabeth Bay]] and [[Woolloomooloo, New South Wales|Woolloomooloo]] *323 - [[Dover Heights]] via [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]], [[New South Head Road]] *324 - [[Watsons Bay]] via [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]], [[New South Head Road]] *325 - [[Watsons Bay]] via [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]], [[New South Head Road]] *326 - [[Bondi Junction]] via [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]], Victoria Road *327 - [[Bondi Junction]] via [[Darling Point]], [[Edgecliff, New South Wales|Edgecliff]], [[Victoria Road, Sydney|Victoria Road]] Inbound bus services: *200 - [[Chatswood]] via [[City]], [[Sydney Harbour Bridge]], [[North Sydney, New South Wales|North Sydney]], [[St Leonards, New South Wales|St Leonards]], [[Artarmon]] *311 - [[Central railway station, Sydney|Central Station]] via Darlinghurst, Oxford Street *323 - [[Sydney]] Circular Quay via [[Elizabeth Street, Sydney|Elizabeth Street]] *324 - Sydney Circular Quay via Elizabeth Street *325 - Sydney Circular Quay via Elizabeth Street *326 - Sydney Circular Quay via Elizabeth Street *327 -
